title: Quinn Ultimate Sound
body:
I had a ARAM game with quinn in my team.
After reaching lvl 6 she can use her ultimate quite frequently.

The problem is that the sound of it was very very loud in comparison to all other sounds. And it's not a gentle sound but the scream of a bird.
She was playing with the "Woad Scout Quinn" skin, maybe that is the cause.
Every one in the team had the same experience.
I ended up muting the game because of that. Getting your ears blasted by a bird every 10sec ain't the best.
And playing muted is kinda hard.
{{champion:133}} BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOK BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOK (Quoting Valor)

replies.body:
2 dinge.
1. das ist das wohl witzigste bug-report das ich lesen durfte
